metadata.title: CVE-2018-9989 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: ARM mbed TLS before 2.1.11, before 2.7.2, and before 2.8.0 has a bufferover-read in ssl_parse_server_psk_hint() that could cause a crash oninvalid input.

criterions.comment: polarssl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
